description:
Turning restaurant brands and operations from average to the top is not simple. It’s about identifying where and why variances in performance exist and to obtain answers for how much and how long it would take to make the transformations to.

Engineering convenience and delivering a seamless and deeply satisfying experience (both for guests and employees) requires a holistic view to menu strategy, pricing psychology, labor optimization, food costs, throughput analysis, inventory rationalization, and speed of service while also considering brand positioning and messaging, and fully understanding the challenges that unit-operations teams can face.

Here we present some insights that will help you make operations faster, leaner, and more agile to optimize margins and achieve top-quartile performance
name: Restaurant Operations
